original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 848: Open the Podbay Doors, Siri
original_content:
This week Jonathan and Rob chat with Paulus Schoutsen about Home Assistant, ESPHome, and Music Assistant, all under the umbrella of the Open Home Foundation. Watch to see Paulus convince Rob and Jonathan that they need to step up their home automation games!


https://www.home-assistant.io/
https://esphome.io/
https://www.music-assistant.io/
https://www.openhomefoundation.org/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.
